name: Heat Patrollah
description:
CONCEPT

You are the HEAT PATROLLAH, and your job is to try to stop the evil and nasty parasites that are eating all the heat from the stars making them cold and dark.

You will need to destroy that freaking hot asteroids and gain some heat to re-heat up your dying star.

Keep an eye on that platoon of stinky and cold parasites that can make things more difficult than what  you think.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

move: w a s d

right hand grab: right click  //  left hand grab: left click  

Action: Spacebar      

Pause: Esc

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

COMBO

Grab: using your mouse you can grab asteroids. if you try to grab enemie you will take damage.

Dash: if you grab an asteroid and you press space you will be pulled in the direction of the asteroid gainig speed and dashing through rocks and enemies. if you grab the same asteroid with two hands and press spacebar you will dash twice as fest (go go fest buay).

Asteroid sledgehammer: you can grab two ateroids at once using your two hands, then pressing spacebar you will smash the two asteroid toghether causing a swagfull explosion that damage enemies and other asteroids.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
